components.name: apps.make.com
components.description: Help page: Introdutcion to Make Apps

incidents.name: The "Make for Google Sheets" add-on is currently unavailable on Google Workspace Marketplace

incident_updates.body: We are working on approval of marketplace add-on with Google team. Available workaround is documented and available - https://apps.make.com/google-sheets.
We keep awaiting approval from Google about our Google Sheets marketplace add-on verification.
We are continuously working with Google verification team to approve our Google Cloud Project and Google Sheets add-on.
We are working on review of new add-on for Google Sheets together with Google team.
We have shared deployment instructions for the workaround with users and are actively working on a permanent solution.
We've identified a workaround and will provide users with clear instructions on how to proceed shortly.
Our team is currently investigating the issue and working on restoring the add-on as soon as possible.

Dear customer,

We are writing to inform you about an upcoming Scheduled infrastructure maintenance on 14th July 2025.
This maintenance will take place between 00:00 and 02:00. 

How will this impact your workload?

Our underlying infrastructure will be under maintenance upon our cloud provider request, some of the following services may be affected for a short period:
- Some shared hooks created during maintenance might not be accepted or processed.
- Logging into the platform might be not possible.
- New subscribers might face issues registering.
- Password reset might not be available.
- Emails and notifications might be delayed.
- Some payments for subscription plans might not be accepted.

We will inform you once the maintenance is completed.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out to our support team.

Thank you very much.
Kind regards,
Your Make Team

[Affected zones: "make.com"]
